name: Policy Breaker!
description:
Smash the party leader faces in order to read the manifesto pledges. You have 10 lives.

I'm learning Unity, and have just reached the Breakout clone section of a helpful Udemy course. Decided to make it topical.

All images courtesy of Wikimedia Commons.
